meanings.definition: To remove bees from a hive.
meanings.sent1: The beekeeper will unhive the bees carefully.
meanings.sent2: It is important to unhive the bees before collecting honey.
meanings.sent3: The bees were surprised when the beekeeper decided to unhive them for a check-up.
meanings.sent4: The beekeeper had to unhive the bees swiftly to avoid any stings.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the beekeeper began to unhive the bees, creating a peaceful buzz in the air.

meanings.definition: To take out of a hive.
meanings.sent1: Carefully unhive the honeycomb to avoid disturbing the bees.
meanings.sent2: The beekeeper will unhive the honeycomb to extract the honey.
meanings.sent3: The bees were surprised when the beekeeper decided to unhive the honeycomb for inspection.
meanings.sent4: The beekeeper had to unhive the honeycomb gently to prevent any damage.
meanings.sent5: With a steady hand, the beekeeper began to unhive the honeycomb, revealing the golden treasure inside.
